usageInfo.name: Disclaimer and Feedback Policy
usageInfo.text: This IP First Response website has been designed to help IP rights holders navigate IP infringement and enforcement by making it visible, accessible, and to provide information about the factors involved in pursuing different options. It does not provide legal, business or other professional advice, and none of the content should be regarded as recommending a specific course of action. We welcome any feedback via our IP First Response feedback form and by emailing us.

isPartOf.name: IP First Response
isPartOf.description: A first port of call for businesses to easily understand complex intellectual property issues.

@graph.name: What can I expect from a lawyer or attorney?
@graph.headline: Getting legal help

mainEntity.name: What can I expect from a lawyer or attorney?

acceptedAnswer.text: *This IP First Response website has been designed to help IP rights holders navigate IP infringement and enforcement by making it visible, accessible, and to provide information about the factors involved in pursuing different options. It does not provide legal, business or other professional advice, and none of the content should be regarded as recommending a specific course of action. We welcome any feedback via our* [*IP First Response feedback form*](https://ipaustralia.au1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_6LKlgPWZqiheCiy) *and by*[*emailing us*](mailto:IPFirstResponse@IPAustralia.gov.au?subject=Feedback%20on%20IP%20First%20Response)*.*

Send us an [email](mailto:ipfirstresponse@ipaustralia.gov.au).\
Fill out our [feedback form](https://ipaustralia.au1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_6LKlgPWZqiheCiy).

contactPoint.description: Feedback and enquiries regarding IP First Response
